description:
The Snake Princess pits Luffy’s Gum Gum abilities against the incredible Haki Power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Difficult Fight for Luffy! The Snake Sisters` Haki Power!!
Duel compliqué pour Luffy ! Le pouvoir du fluide des sœurs Gorgones !
Luffy Daikusen! Hebi Shimai no Haki no Chikara!!
Тяжёлое испытание Луффи! Сила воли сестёр—змей!
يخوض لوفي قتالاً مختلفًا! قوى الهاكي للأختان الأفعى!
ルフィ大苦戦! ヘビ姉妹の覇気の力!!
